title: Dashboard â€” Rename heading to Dashboard
description: Change the main heading on the dashboard page from 'Command Center' to 'Dashboard'. Subheading remains unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: Styling consistent with other page headings

steps.details: In app/admin/dashboard/page.tsx, find 'Command Center' string and replace with 'Dashboard'.
Confirm the heading still uses the same text-2xl or text-3xl font-bold styling pattern as other admin pages.
